snippet.title: Planet Crafter Planet: Humble DLC Release Date Reveal - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
Find out when Planet: Humble, the hotly anticipated expansion for Planet Crafter releases in this exclusive trailer from the Convergence Showcase. Experience a fresh start as a Planet Crafter on the brand new world of Planet Humble! Alone or with friends, scout this unknown land, discover its story, novelties and secrets and accomplish once again the task to terraform an entire world!

Wishlist today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3142540

#convergenceshow #indiegame
